forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 64F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
